title: Suitable arrangement of vertical / horizontal handrails with 50 mm
clause_text: Suitable arrangement of vertical / horizontal handrails with 50 mm. clearance from wall shall be made in the toilet.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Suitable arrangement of vertical / horizontal handrails with 50 mm. clearance from wall shall be made in the toilet.
